query:
SELECT t.id, t.name, t.userId, u.email as ownerEmail, u.openId as ownerOpenId
FROM trips t
JOIN users u ON t.userId = u.id
WHERE t.id = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT t.id, t.name, t.userId, u.email as ownerEmail, u.openId as ownerOpenId
FROM trips t
JOIN users u ON t.userId = u.id
WHERE t.id = 1;
